alert.note: Alert for Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Stephenson County through 615 PM CDT... At 550 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Freeport to near Mount Morris. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Freeport around 600 PM CDT. German Valley around 605 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Davis, Rock City and Ridott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
